contentrichtext.text: '''Inger and Lasse Sandberg''' are [[Sweden|Swedish]] authors of [[children's literature|children's books]]. They have created many characters, among them the most famous, ''[[The Little Ghost Godfrey]]'' (Lilla SpÃ¶ket Laban). Lasse Sandberg died on 11 November 2008, in [[Karlstad]], after a short time of illness. He was 84. Lasse Sandberg was also known as a talented artist and, formerly, a [[cartoonist]] and [[List of comic creators|comic creator]] in his home country. == External links == * [http://www.svd.se/nyheter/inrikes/artikel_2031665.svd Obituary] {{sv}}, ''[[Svenska Dagbladet]]'' {{DEFAULTSORT:Sandberg, Inger And Lasse}} [[Category:Swedish-language writers]] [[Category:Swedish illustrators]] [[Category:Swedish cartoonists]] [[Category:Litteris et Artibus recipients]] {{comics-creator-stub}}
